title: Maxim 53860AL CounterMax MX-LD Surface/Recessed Mount Under Cabinet Disc 3" LED Cabinet Puck, 2.3 Watt, 3000K, Dimmable, Brushed Aluminum
features: COUNTERMAX PUCK LIGHT DIMENSIONS: 0.5" High x 2.75" Wide, Weight: 0.19 lbs.

LIGHTING: 2.3 Watt PCB Integrated LED Bulb (Included); 3000K, 220 Lumens, 80+ CRI; Fully Dimmable with ELV and Trial Dimmers; Dimmable Using a Standard Dimmer When Used in Conjunction with the Available Dimmable Driver
INSTALLATION: Hardware to Mount Fixture to an Existing Junction Box Included (Junction Box Not Included)
DETAILS: Constructed of Aluminum with Brushed Aluminum Finish and Acrylic Shade
description: The versatile counter Maxmx-l-d LED disc features two piece aluminum construction that allows for both surface mounting or recessed installation and are designed for daisy chain installation of up to nine discs on one driver with direct-wire installation. Mx-l-d LED discs operate at a fraction of the heat of a halogen or xenon discs and consume less than three watts of electricity. When used in conjunction with the available dimmable driver, mx-l-d LED discs are dimmable using a standard dimmer. This combination of versatility, safety, energy efficiency and flammability make the mx-l-d LED discs the smart choice for disc lighting.
